website_summaries.verdict: Premium USB-C cords for mobile devices. Great for spares or replacements, especially when you need to keep multiple cords in different places around the house.
pros: The braided nylon jacket keeps the cord protected from repeated bending, coiling, and moisture to extend the longevity of the cord
A copper-tipped plate speeds up charging times for most phone batteries
cons: Transfer speeds aren’t as fast as other options

customer_reviews.title: high quality with useful extras
customer_reviews.text: Cables seem to be high quality. connector fits snugly in phone. The cables came in a very high quality storage bag with drawstrings, almost worth the purchase price by it self. A nice touch was to include a micro USB to C USB adapter, not just 1 but 1 for each cable! Very Happy with the purchase. Thank you MARGE PLUS!
customer_reviews.author: J. D.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice to replace your charging cord
customer_reviews.text: The cords arrived quickly and packaged very well inside a small cinch style bag. The cords a very well made and the connections fit perfectly snug in my phone, charger, laptop, etc. They are definitely more durable than the OEM cord I replaced, it was coming apart at the ends due to normal wear and tear over the past few years. I especially liked the addition of the small adapter for micro USB to USB C. I don't anticipate having to use it now that i have the three charging cables, but i have it attached to my keys in the event it ever is needed. it also fits snug when i tested it out.
customer_reviews.author: Jason B.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, fits my needs great
customer_reviews.text: These appear very good quality and are very flexible. They come with a rubber loop to keep it together making it easier to transport if needed. They plug right into anything with a USB port so I didn't have to go buy all new chargers for my S8. The adapter is handy too, has a loop to attach to keyring (or anything). The 6 foot length works well for me. This was a very good price for 3 cords, I keep one at work, one at home and one in my purse.
customer_reviews.author: DStar

customer_reviews.title: Best charger cords I've purchased to date!
customer_reviews.text: I just received these charger cords today and an thoroughly impressed. My phone charged just s quickly ad it does with its original cord. I am very impressed with the quality and the value of this top of the line 3- charger cord set PLUS the adaptor that's included. Your search is over fur a quality, fairly priced charger cord.
customer_reviews.author: Maria B. Costello

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy cables -- beautifully packaged
customer_reviews.text: These are not just plain old cables -- they are classy looking with special rubber band on it to keep extra length wrapped up and out of your way -- plus a converter for the older type of connecting port. Plus it all comes in a classy silver bag. I was impressed and am happy to have these extra charging cords. (Although I occasionally get an error message about using the "original LG 5" cord which it says would be faster. Not sure if that's a fault with this cord or just the fact that LG only wants you using the original. Either way, I'm happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: ) come packed very nicely. Three chords are in a ziplock
customer_reviews.text: Firstly, the products (besides arriving on time,) come packed very nicely. Three chords are in a ziplock, as is the adapter. The ziplock is then inside a nice, drawstring bag, suitable to take anywhere you go. The adaptor, has a little chord, and ring, making it easy to attach to a key ring, or even the phone case. (I didn't do that, because I didn't want to remove/attach every time.) Very satisfied and would definitely recommend this to anyone with a C-type charger.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzie

customer_reviews.title: Garbage. False advertising. Not fast charging. Battery drains faster than it charges.
customer_reviews.text: I was pretty happy with these at first, but then the problems started trickling in... They don't charge consistently. Sometimes it will charge correctly, but other times it will only slow charge (I am using a fast charging USB plug btw, so it is definitely the cable that is the issue). The other issue is that it's not a very tight fit into the port. It comes unplugged easily, and wiggles a bit while plugged in (which concerns me, as I don't want it to loosen/damage my phone port over time). Overall, the cord itself seems durable, but there is a bit of false advertising regarding the charging speed. And the loose fit is a real deal killer.
customer_reviews.author: SimplyT

customer_reviews.title: Good value, with some nice bonuses!
customer_reviews.text: Very good value for 3xUSB-C cables. These would normally cost a lot more, and they all seem to be working. The inclusion of a micro-usb to usbc tip is really nice, and the bag also was unexpected. Everything seems to be made of high quality materials with each cable having a secure braid wrapped around it. Charges my Galaxy S10+, Nintendo Switch, and Battery bank just fine as well as the controllers for my switch. Would gladly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Craigory Coppola

customer_reviews.title: Lots of bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.text: These cables far surpass what I expected from the price. You get 3 really nicely made cables for a very good price. I expected cables that would be okay but these are way better than what I expected. The 3 cables are high quality and an awesome deal. The included adapter and bag were just icing on the already great cake. Will definitely be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: CHRIS

customer_reviews.title: Terrible!!
customer_reviews.text: Updates: The company saw my review and was really nice to send me a new one. They work perfectly well now! I guess the first order I received was a bad batch... definitely an inconvenience since I needed it during my travel but I'll give to the company for their concern and wanting to fix it. Thanks for the new cords. Terrible!!! It doesn't charge at all!! When u plug it in it will say it's charged n then seconds later it stops charging. It's like that Everytime I replug it in. DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.author: Tina Duh

customer_reviews.title: Super long, slow to charge!
customer_reviews.text: Great length and durability which is he reason for buying them, however they are super slow to charge. They are essentially the wrong volts for the phone and the cable doesn't convert so it's slower than the cable that comes with the google pixel plus at least. If you're looking for speed this is not it! Length is definitely a plus!
customer_reviews.author: KO

customer_reviews.title: Only Slow Charges. Takes 10+ hours to fully charge.
customer_reviews.text: It feels like it is built really well so I was disappointed to see 1) they doing fit will into the phone charging port 2) they only slow charge. It'll be plugged in all night and only be at 90% charge 8 hours later.
customer_reviews.author: Lego-My-Schlago

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality doesn't work right out of the packaging.
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the package these cables don't work. I make a nice clean connection, plug it into my Samsung brand phone charger and I get NOTHING. I unplug and replace it with my old cable and that one works perfectly. Verdict? This is a garbage product that just doesn't work. Unfortunately I bought these for travel as I'm leaving for California on Friday. Great, thanks for nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Lombardo

customer_reviews.title: Cable is good for charging but 2 out of 3 cables not able to use as data transfer cable.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these cable they are nice quality and durable but I never tested these as data transfer cable till recently and 2 out of the 3 cables doesnt not work as data transfer cable for the computer. When I plug the cables in to the computer and phone it only shows up "slow charging" on phone notification. Tested all 3 cables and only 1 works as data transfer. Charging function for all the cables work, they all charges fast charging if you use the correct fast charger. I try emailing the seller since these come with 18 months warranty but I haven't gotten reply back. I will update if anything changes.
customer_reviews.author: Lwin Naing

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, these cables are durable and the added usb c to micro usb is a BONUS! They feel very premium and at the price it is a steal!
customer_reviews.author: Giselle

customer_reviews.title: These are junk
customer_reviews.text: I don't believe I have ever used the term "junk" in any of my Amazon reviews... but... I received these June 13 2019. July 17 2019 the last one (cord #3) stopped charging. I should have returned the first one when it stopped after 2 weeks. Or the 2nd one after IT stopped after 2 weeks. But the 3rd one only lasted 1 week! Just past the return window of July 13. (Shame on me. ) But if you buy these, shame on you.. you were warned! LOL For the record, I use a wireless trickle charger at night, and am an older adult. I am not hard on chargers, typically.
customer_reviews.author: JilSpan

customer_reviews.title: high-quality, durable, looooong boys.
customer_reviews.text: i picked these up because they're cheap. that's how this works. i was pleasantly surprised when they arrived the next day in a fabulous box; sure, it didn't impact the function, but it's a sure mark of quality. the connectors seem to be gold-plated, the highest standard. when paired with an aftermarket wall wart, these cables charged my phone faster than the original manufacturer's cable, and did the same for my partner's switch lite. the nylon braid is tight and solid, with no stray hairs or pulled-out bits like you get witcheap cables sometimes. ultimately there's not much more to say. they're incredibly solid and reliable, long long long and cost virtually nothing. pick your favorite color and go!
customer_reviews.author: Skyler West

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good.  Bought because of the 18 month guarantee.
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. Bought a very similar set a couple of months ago, and they gave out very quickly. These have an 18 month guarantee, and I hope they work better than the others. Also comes with a handy adapter which helps convert a more common micro-USB plug to a USB-C plug. Haven't tried it yet, but I like the concept.
customer_reviews.author: AlohaLoveToSave

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality cables
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I pulled these cables out of the package my exact thoughts were, "wow, these are some nice cables". Metal ends, nicely covered cable, and great packaging. Cables work exactly as they should, as does the adapter that comes with the cables. These cables are a great value and the company stands behind their product(s). I have numerous items from Marge Plus and I will continue to buy their products.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Great value for USB-C!
customer_reviews.text: I mean, they're cords. But here we go... They are braided and flexible enough where it feels like it'll last you a while. The length is pretty darn long so you can plug this into a USB charger and use your phone and NOT feel too tethered. They don't feel like they bottleneck the charge... remember that the main factor in your charging speed is your USB charger and how much amperage there is. The cords themselves come with a little rubber piece on it so that you can tidy up your cords when you are not using them and not have to worry about losing rubber bands, cable ties, etc. Probably one of the best values for USB-C cables.
customer_reviews.author: Ray B.

customer_reviews.title: CAUTION!!! DO NOT BUY!!! DOESN'T WORK AT ALL!!!
customer_reviews.text: CAUTION!!! DO NOT BUY!!! DOESN'T WORK AT ALL!!! NEVER DID!! I bought this 3 pack 6ft cords for my daughter for her first iPad Pro. Unfortunately, because it was a gift we didn't try it until she opened her gift today (31 days later). 1 day too late!! We tried different outlets and power plugs with NO success. Not one of the three cords worked! The other brand option (3ft) worked just fine. I recommend that company instead. I posted their link below. I also posted pics of the two different cords plugged. This one not working vs the other working.
customer_reviews.author: JMill

customer_reviews.title: Good length and seems durable
customer_reviews.text: These cords are a great length for plugging behind a nightstand or desk. It’s always annoying when I stay in a hotel, and the one plug in the entire room is hidden behind a nightstand and my cord is too short to reach the desk. This solves the issue! The rubber band is also nice for keeping cords tidy in my bags. The cords are braided, which reduces fraying at the ends. I will also add that these cords have a bit of weight to them. I have a similar set of Anker charging cables, and these are a little heavier. That probably doesn’t make a big difference to most people though. Overall, a good buy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: My kids won't use anything except "the blue charger"
customer_reviews.text: *I waited 2 months to review to make sure they were durable My kids lose/destroy cords ALL THE TIME or they lose the rubber band to keep it wound up when not in use. But, when they recieved the holy grail of phone chargers, they rocked their worlds. These have a strong braided casing, it protects the ends where they normally wear out. There is a small band attached for when you wind it up. Now EVERYONE makes sure they know where their blue charger is, because no on is willing to share these 😆
customer_reviews.author: RN Davis

customer_reviews.title: Professional Presentation
customer_reviews.text: Loved the packaging. Very nicely presented. It was well protected. The item is made of excellent quality.
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality materials and workmanship.
customer_reviews.text: These are top notch charging cables that are made to last under heavy use. The materials are tightly braided with excellent ends they fit snug without being difficult to insert or remove from the charging device or charger the 6 foot length makes them useful for many devices and they provide a rapid and complete charge without heating up we've been using these for over a month and they still look brand new and are still performing flawlessly. For the price of this 3 pack of cables this is a great buy based on their quality and durbility
customer_reviews.author: it is what it is

customer_reviews.title: Works, what more can a cable do?
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a longer cable to plug in my phone for charging since with my new desk, the plugs moved farther away. I could have bought a hub or extension or whatever, but buying a 6-foot cable seemed like the easiest solution. These cables (I got the black ones) work exactly the same as the 3-foot OEM one that came with my phone. No issues. Based on the price, the fact that you get 3, and the fact that they work just fine, I'd say 5* (will update if my phone explodes lol!)
customer_reviews.author: Common Cents

customer_reviews.title: Cord started twisting after 7 days but still fast charges. **great customer support**
customer_reviews.text: Honestly not sure what happened, I use this to charge my switch and phone and today I noticed it has a little red tumor lol not sure how on Earth the cable got permanently twisted but I remember that happened after the first week. Now today it is like, almosttt going to burst. My other less used cables are fine, not sure what about this made it get all coiled. Charges just fine.. for now. **Wow without me reaching out the supplier touched base with me and helped resolved my issue. Much appreciated for having the honor**
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality, extra features, fast shipping.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these cables because I only had one USB-C cable left. The package arrived earlier than expected and the cables are better than I expected too for the price. The package comes with 3 cables and they are all braided, they seem to be high quality. It was a pleasant surprise to find it came with a small, very nice storage bag to keep the cables in, and it also came with a micro-USB to USB-C adapter, i found that nice because now I can keep just one cord in the car for most of my divorces instead of having several in the console. Overall I’m very satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha Herring

customer_reviews.title: Just great
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely liked this purchase. First, let me start by saying that three cords is just fantastic. They are all High quality material which I love to receive every-time I make a purchase. I think it’s very useful that the cable are long, I always move around so extra length is the best and this product has it and do not get me started with charging, it’s really great and it brings a separate one too, so in total four for that price. Very great.
customer_reviews.author: Wil

customer_reviews.title: All 3 didn't work properly
customer_reviews.text: First off these were bought to replace a factory/OEM cable that came with my LG Stylo 4. The phone does support fast charging. All 3 of them, when plugged into the factory/OEM charger show the same issue. They will not charge the phone and are actually discharging the battery. See screenshot. I will be returning and purchasing a different set of cables. Cables seemed nice, came with a carrying pouch and an adapter for Micro USB to USB-C. They were a very tight fit when pushing into the phone.
customer_reviews.author: David M. Wright

customer_reviews.title: This is the Gold Standard of how cables should be made.
customer_reviews.text: Changing phone cables is not typically a big deal as you go through the standard cycle of order, use, and replace. Upon receipt of these cables, I must say that I was pleasantly surprised with both their presentation, build quality and value. Pros: Nylon Braided cables for increased durability. Protectant rubber in high wear areas (between the cable and connector) Rubber cable management dongle built into the cable itself. Includes USB 2.0 micro-B to USB C dongle Includes a very convenient carry case. Incredible value for the money. Cons: None that I can see thus far.
customer_reviews.author: QikPass

customer_reviews.title: Very impressive packaging.  Seems to be high quality.
customer_reviews.text: They arrived in a very professional package. You might expect the box to hold an Android Phone or other such high quality device. Inside the package were three well made cords plus an adapter to fit to another usb type connector. I'm not sure what the adaptor fits but you don't need to use it for a type C phone. Overall, I can't judge durability but the cords feel as if they will not break in the short time! A very good value for USB C cables.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Aggie

customer_reviews.title: Well made, looks durable and well worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Nice and long cables, perfect for my wireless chargers on my nightstand and at my desk. Usually you get a 3 ft cable with stuff you purchase and always have to have everything on a counter with an outlet near. Now you can put your power adapter almost anywhere and have plenty of length to get from outlet to you phone or tablet charger or whatever device needs power. A great value for the money. Oh and there was a neat little USB-C to micro-USB adapter.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky_Riccardo

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: i'm really hard on cables, especially since i take my phone to bed while it's charging, so i'm not surprised to be down to my last one of these almost a year to the day after purchasing. what i was surprised by was how amazingly sturdy they are at only $3 apiece!! i love the length, and the color selection is awesome; the rose pink matches my rose gold phone case exactly. if you're a general disaster like me and already have a zillion black cables, pick something bright!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far, I like them!
customer_reviews.text: Gone through a number of these USB-C cables in the recent past and there are soooo many cheap ones out there, even ones that look good. Got some that looked like quality, but lasted about 10 connect and disconnect cycles. The problem was that the vendor (wasn't on Amazon) refused to give me a full refund, even though all 3 cables I bought ended up in the trash. I'm using one of these cables right now that's been connected a lot of times and still works perfectly. There's a difference between junk and quality. In this case, it wasn't the price. Highly recommended so far!
customer_reviews.author: DukeCityMan

customer_reviews.title: Good Cable - but not Turbo Fast
customer_reviews.text: The cable appears to be of good quality and I like the built-in elastic cable wrap that comes with it. Only complaints are: - This is not a "Turbo Charging" cable - at least not for my Motorola Z2 - and other third party sellers have managed this capability, but not this cable. - It's a little stiff and does not conform around objects on its own - it requires some force. Otherwise, charging time is faster than many other cables I've used, and at this price point, they're a good deal that will NOT be returned. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Rebootin' Rubin

customer_reviews.title: Affordable Product
customer_reviews.text: I use them to charge my laptop and tablet. The cables has a very good quality and are long enough for my needs. I like the small adapter for micro USB to USB C. With this small adapter, I can use the micro USB to USB A cable charge my devices when I don't have USB C cable around. The power charge is fast. I wish they also have a female USB A to female USB A adapter. When I use my gaming headset, I can plug USB A male head for the headset light into the adapter + this cable to play game on my tablet. Anyway, the carrying bag is a nice one.
customer_reviews.author: SH

customer_reviews.title: Superb Cables and Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Superb cables! Shipping...Fast Packaging...Excellent Materials...Excellent Durability...early, but Excellent so far Value...Excellent Fast charging speed is importsnt to us. I ordered these cable along with another brand and charged two Samsung Note 8s with the same battery life and percentage...one test at 20% battery life another at 60 and another at 80. These cables charged to 100% faster on all 3 tests. The usb-c fits snug into all of my devices. Very pleased with these cables. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Lion King

customer_reviews.title: Super flexible & sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I never really expect much from charging cables; even if you see them, there's no way to know how sturdy they really are or how they'll hold up. Although I haven't had these long enough to speak to longevity, I can state that the connectors are secure, the cord is very flexible and I like the attached band to cinch up unwanted length. Since my new phone takes the "C" end, I needed to find extra charging cables and this fit the bill to a T. If these stand the test of time, I would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Robin L.

customer_reviews.title: BEST CHARGING CABLES EVER!
customer_reviews.text: Why? Because they FIT CORRECTLY, and DON'T FALL OUT. You don't have to keep wiggling the cable to make contact or prop up the cable in **just** the right angle to charge - just plug this in (it gives a very little 'snap' when it is all the way into the socket) and it makes contact and stays there. Far better than the charging cables provided with whatever item I am charging. 6 feet is a little long - would pref 5 feet, but, that's what the INCLUDED ELASTIC is for!
customer_reviews.author: Stromie

customer_reviews.title: Best replacement chargers yet.
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased many charging cables over the years, and generally, they arrive with half of them not working, and the other half die within a few weeks. These cables are extremely durable, and work as well as the chargers that came with my phone. The length is great. You can plug it in and still use the phone, because the cable will reach where you need it to go. Would purchase again, but I doubt I'll need to!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica S

customer_reviews.title: Seriously GREAT product
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea how can they be so inexpensive and yet so perfect, but they are. I have one at work, one in the car and one at home....new phone doesn't need to be charged that much (I bought these because my old Moto Z2 with a full charge would only stay on a couple of hours) but still...I like the touch of the nice fabric used to build these cables and it comes with adapter usb-b to C and each cable has a rubber attached to it to store it neatly. Again for a ridiculous price. One happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Alex M.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful silver color
customer_reviews.text: Excellent package of 3 usb to c cables compatible with samsung s8, s9 or s10, they have a liner highly resistant to weather or temperature shocks, they have a magnificent and modern silver color that gives an air of modernity to any room. And as great attraction they have 3 different lengths for comfort depending on the environment, it can be used in the car, home and office. 3.6 feet USB C Cable with adapter in micro USB port and converts it to USB C. New Fast Charging and High quality rapid charging power,
customer_reviews.author: Reategui

customer_reviews.title: Love these, definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: I tend to only buy Anker because their cords are thick and sturdy and don't break and bend after long-term use. I charge my phone often while I'm using it and since phone manufacturers are still too stupid to put a charging port on the top or side, the charger tends to get bent when I rest it on my lap. These are the only cords besides Anker who hold up well to bending and stay put in the charging and USB ports. Plus the pink color is a beautiful metallic pink, just like the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Lasted only a few months.
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get this cord and so impressed with the way it was packaged and the quality of the way it looked. And three items for $10 couldn't beat the price. But one by one the end that goes into the phone bent and stopped working. Maybe I just got a bad batch.
customer_reviews.author: KellyG

customer_reviews.title: Buy another
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money. I had these put away for when I needed them and when I finally did, I tried each cable and none worked. Tried multiple outlets/power blocks/devices with no luck. Tries to charge phone with a slow trickle that doesn't even match the power the phone is using when in standby. Unfortunately, I am outside the return window. Waste of time and money. I can say that the adapter that was included has got me through some tight spots.
customer_reviews.author: Clint

customer_reviews.title: Quality way much worth the price! You will definitely Love the length if you have a toddler at home.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husby. It could fast charge his phone. He really loves it a lot. BTW, You will definitely Love the length especially when you have a toddler touching and exploring everything at home. We have to hide all the power strip at a safe place. We really need this long cord to reach the phone when charging. I have to say the quality is way much worth the price! I got 3 long sturdy cords at the price of 1 in the local store. One for work, one for home and one in the car! Just Perfect! The quality of materials is soft and durable too.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Fast charging, sturdy, great value
customer_reviews.text: Like the color (pink), makes it easy to spot the one you want among a sea of cords! I got it to charge a Samsung Galaxy S10+ phone. For some reason Samsung changed the size of the phone-end plug on the new phones. But they were smart to included an adapter to convert back to old size when needed. Multiple cords not needed. Only thing I don't like is the length I purchased. My fault. Rather have a 3 ft. cord than 6 ft. Highly recommend product though.
customer_reviews.author: Betty O

customer_reviews.title: D.O.A.
customer_reviews.text: I needed extra chargers for work and "Was" excited to try them out....The first time I plugged the cord into my LG V30 plus after 10 minutes , I went to check my phone to see how fast it was charging. To my suprise ....the part where it connects to my phone was 110 degrees and not even charging! I tried the other 2 cords and got the same result. Maybe I got a lemon, because i kept looking at all these great reviews...
customer_reviews.author: Alvin

customer_reviews.title: So glad I found these
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this 3 pack because my wife is very hard on charging cables. The last charging cable she had for her phone she handed to me because she was afraid to plug it in and use it because the plug cover pulled completely off. I handed her my spare 10ft cable which she was displeased with due to the length. I found this 3 pack with only 6ft cables which is exactly what she needs. Should be the last set I need to buy her, but if not they are a great deal at this price!
customer_reviews.author: Ray Melberg

customer_reviews.title: Don't Waste Your Time or Money
customer_reviews.text: These cables are the worst I've ever purchased. They seemed great right out of the package, but I learned that they don't hold up. I didn't even put them through hard usage, I was only using them with my bedside charger at night. After approx 3 weeks the cable would stop working and I would grab the next one in the pack. I purchased them less than two months ago, and the third and final cable died last night. What a waste of money, but at least they were cheap. You get what you pay for, I suppose!
customer_reviews.author: Billie

customer_reviews.title: The product is amazing quality and the additional perks are worth it.
customer_reviews.text: The charging cables are fast charge compatible and are very pleasant to use compared to other charge cables. They have a soft feel to them and doesn't kink or stay kinked. Each cable comes with a very handy rubber band that attaches to the cable and makes it so easy to keep the excess cable bound up. This product also comes with a dongle that has a micro usb to C-type charge adaptor that I can keep on my keys in case someone only has a micro usb cable for me to use. I immediately bought another order of these charge cables.
customer_reviews.author: MN

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Been using these for about two years now and they're still going strong! Durable, long cord, great price, and they charge my phone super fast. I'll definitely re-order them when I inevitably start losing them.... Edit: Couple years later and these are still my go-to. I re-order them about once a year when I've finally lost all of them lol. Only ever had one or two stop working, and both times it was my fault not theirs (one got dropped in buffalo sauce.....oops). Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Three chargers with a extra head. Lifetime warranty. Basically three chargers for almost seven dollar is a great deal, including a lifetime warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Flexible, well made cable
customer_reviews.text: A bit pricey, but appears to be constructed to last, the length is generous but not problematic due to the superior flexibility of the knitted fiber cover. Only time will tell, but at first inspection, they appear durable and sturdy. USB "C" connector is long enough to enable grasping the plug instead of the cable when removing the connector from the device which will prevent stress on the most vulnerable part of the cable if the owner chooses to act wisely...
customer_reviews.author: RQBII

customer_reviews.title: Wow! Even better than Pictured! Excellent Fast-Charge Cables.
customer_reviews.text: The set I got was even better than pictured!! This is my second time to order these. The first set was great. Exactly as pictured. Charges very fast (with a good base), holds up very well to wear and tear. But this second set is even better! This set has even more bend protection on the ends and thicker coating for anti-fray than what is pictured. What a nice surprise. Excellent price for charge cables of this quality. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Chevy0846810

customer_reviews.title: Cheap but great quality!
customer_reviews.text: My husband has the new Mac daddy iPad, it’s been a pain to make sure we have a USB C cord when we travel. There’s been times we have had many lightning cords but not one for his iPad. I ordered these as extras because they were inexpensive, I just wanted a couple to live in the overnight bag to avoid that in the future. My extras are now nicer than my every day one. They are coated with thick nylon cording, feel heavy, and they are the perfect length.
customer_reviews.author: Beatles Lover

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: As I read of other reviews, this set of cables seemed to be a step up even with the little things. It came with 3 cables, an adapter to help use the older style cables they had on earlier phones, a well made sinch top storage bag and each cable had a nice attached rubber band to hold the cable bundled when not being used. I admit I was really surprised at how limber the cables are and they work very well. The card with these cables says alot about the quality.
customer_reviews.author: William Grissom

customer_reviews.title: Three pack USB Cables
customer_reviews.text: I bought these USB Cables for my son and they’re better then I expected. I wasn’t sure what to expect but they exceeded my expectations. They are a great price for quality product and I'm truly impressed with the USB Type Cables. We put one in the car, one in his book bag and kept one at home. They’re very sturdy cables. He really appreciated the rubber holder....to keep wrapped up or to shorten. The USB cables comes nicely wrapped in a grey bag. My son is very happy with them and I’m glad I purchased them.
customer_reviews.author: Cw

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Color
customer_reviews.text: I chose pink color and it looks more beautiful in person. It's a lilac-rose. The braid is very tight and feels hard but it's fine. I think that will assist in it lasting longer. This cord does indeed fast-charge. 6 ft is the perfect length to keep at my work desk and in my backpack. I also like that this came with a nice quality draw string carry bag. It's useful for other things and not just for the cables.
customer_reviews.author: Jaguar Jessie Jones

customer_reviews.title: Awesome cables with good quality
customer_reviews.text: First of all, very fast shipping. Ordered on Monday and received on Tuesday. The quality of the cable is awesome. It is a perfect replacement for my Google Pixel XL 2 and OnePlus 6 phones. These cables are nylon wrapped, so it won't bend on the ends. If someone is looking for a replacement cable or extra for your office and other places, I would recommend this cable. Need to talk about the cord length also which exceeds my expectation. Overall very satisfied customer and recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: AshKum

customer_reviews.title: Not sure about all the good reviews - slowwwww charging - multiple cables tested
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea how there are so many good reviews. These are the slowest charging cables I've ever used. I have tried multiples of these cables and they all trigger the slow charging indicator on my laptop. They are very durable and physically feel like good quality, but if they are this slow at charging, that is not good ... They should, at least, do what they say and charge at least moderately fast. Would not recommend and won't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: S. Aschoff

customer_reviews.title: Strong charge. Strong material
customer_reviews.text: The 3 pack charging cable set is wonderful! Not only does it come with a to-go bag, but it comes with 3 cables for about the price of two. I can have one at home, the car, and the third for everywhere else. The quality of the cable is strong and not made with the flimsy plastic material other cables are made out of. These cables were built to last. Also, it comes with a free adapter so it wont be needed to buy a different cable ever again.
customer_reviews.author: Rawr Means I love you in Dinosaur

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Durable USB-C cords, nice packaging.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a durable cord since all of mine always fray at the ends and these work great. Very sturdy and the woven cord feels nice too. These have a stretchy loop built into the cord that helps if you need to stow it for a trip. I was surprised to also find a keychain that converts a Micro USB to a Type C port along with a cool little travel bag. This is hands down the best deal on USB-C cords I have ordered. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: candido ortiz

customer_reviews.title: One of the best deals out there
customer_reviews.text: Finally something good to charge with. I've gone through multiple wires that claim to be fast charging and durable and have USB capability with my computer but nothing in this price range has worked this well. As you can see from the pictures, the max current I was receiving through one of the older USB C wires was close to 350ma but this current one is well on par with the original cable of my galaxy s8+ specifications. I dont think for this price you will get anything better. Very happy with purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Pranesh

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how these continue to get good reviews. 2 of the 3 stopped "fast charging". I thought it was the charger and not the cable but it sure was the cable. They also feel a little thicker because it's not as easy for them to go inside the port of the phone like the original ones or my anker ones.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Guerrero

customer_reviews.title: Charge incredibly slow! Less than 1% in over half an hour.
customer_reviews.text: Cables came in the package neat and were delivered on time/early. The only thing is the main reason I bought the cables, to charge my phone! They can barely do that! They charge so incredibly slow that my phone had been charging at 28% for over 30 minutes! They feel strong and nice but dont show for it. I would never buy these again. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Lasted about 9 months
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cord in Sept 2019 and it no longer holds a good connection. Requires lots of fidgeting to ensure my phone is charging. It's now July 2020, so it lasted about 9 month. I'd prefer these things last longer, but I guess I should just plan to replace cords often. Despite the short shelf life, the cord works well and the length is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: JenniMac05

customer_reviews.title: No Quick Charge
customer_reviews.text: These cables DO NOT support qualcomm Quick Charge, which was a major requirement for me. I've only had them for a day now, but have tried two different QC chargers, but no Quick Charge. Ironically, a cheapo USB-A to micro-USB cable with the little micro-USB to USB-C adapter that came with the cables does support Quick Charge. Many phones now support quick charge (and generally come with a QC charger), so I would not recommend these cables for most situations.
customer_reviews.author: SteveA

customer_reviews.title: Did Not Last - Do Not Buy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these charging cords for my kids iphone replacement cords and they did not last. I was very unhappy and had to purchased more cables within a week. I would like to receive a refund.
customer_reviews.author: LA Hope

customer_reviews.title: Not FAST charging cables
customer_reviews.text: I liked they were long, and the quality looks great BUT my pixel3a says charging, not rapid charging as the regular type c to c does. I tried these in-car fast charger adapter and charger for my Arlo 110v plug-in batteries which will only charge by a fast charger. I was going to return them however I found they were still useful at a slower charging rate and to transfer via cable to a computer.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Carmen M

customer_reviews.title: Great charging cords
customer_reviews.text: I got these because I'm a chronic phone charger and needed some spares, but also because my factory charger was giving me a "slow charging" notification. I was skeptical because these were so affordable but they're great. I replaced my original, have one in the car and one at work. They're long and really sturdy and I haven't gotten a slow charging notification from any of them. Would definitely buy again but can't imagine that I'll need to.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt last... Super slow charging
customer_reviews.text: Sadly the 1st one stopped working within a month and the spare just recently died, more or less. Super slow at charging and I get the ever so popular pop up message saying slow charging, use charger that came with the phone blah blah blah. Doubt I'll buy again. Too bad, I love the length, the elastic band to wrap up nicely for travel. They just don't last long. On to the next charger!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amy H.

customer_reviews.title: One of the cords does not work
customer_reviews.text: I would have given a better review, as I like the length of the cords and they seem sturdy. However, one of the cords did not work which I found out the hard way - I was headed to the airport and using google maps to get there, thinking my phone was charging. Instead, my phone died and I was left completely lost. Lucky for me a very kind gas station employee printed me out the directions and I was able to make it! Unfortunately, I missed the return period, so sucks to be me!
customer_reviews.author: College student

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived as expected. I am extremely happy with the quality of the charging cable. For being so affordable I will be able to keep a charger at home, in the car, at work and any place in between. The bag that arrived with the cables is also a good quality material that could have multiple uses, a bonus in my mind.
customer_reviews.author: Gavin Jones

customer_reviews.title: Dont charge well
customer_reviews.text: While these cords DO charge my phone (first used on a Pixel 2 and than Samsung Note 10) it takes sooooooo much longer than it should. I mean its great that it comes in a 3 pack but not if they take that long to charge. For example, got a cord from the store and it will take less than an hour to charge from phone fully from dead. These cords said 13-15 hours from 20%
customer_reviews.author: Katharyn G.

customer_reviews.title: Ruined My Phone!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Fried my Battery port on my GalaxyS8! Literally smoke and all!!! $200 to replace, and I do not have the money to replace it! I now have to charge my phone with the wireless charging pad which does not charge my phone quickly. My phone now also loses the charge faster then previously. :( Do not get these! Not worth it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Great cables
customer_reviews.text: These are great cables. The fabric wrap finish on them repels dirt and keeps them from snagging Even when using with fast chargers they don’t heat up, and they charge well. The tips are sturdy, and weighty. These cables will last and last. Very happy with them. They also came with a microUSB to USB-C adapter. Effectively a 4 pack, and with a nice bag too
customer_reviews.author: willisotaTop Contributor: Firefly (TV Show)

customer_reviews.title: Charging Speed:  This is NOT A FAST CHARGER!!!
customer_reviews.text: One of the biggest factors was whether this product would fast charge. There were cheaper options, but I chose this because it had a large number of high ratings and specifically indicated that it was a fast charger. I tested it with the original samsung charger and the time to charge is definitely longer with these cables than with the original manufacturer's USB C Cable. I tested another of the cables to see if one of them was "bad." But both cables charged much slower than the original cable. They do seem to be STURDY cables that look nice, BUT THEY DO CHARGE SLOWLY, NOT QUICKLY. :( I am very annoyed and may end up returning it.....
customer_reviews.author: My 2 Cents

customer_reviews.title: Only one in three worked!
customer_reviews.text: Only one of the three cables actually delivers an appropriate charge. Of the other two one charges but won't "fast charge" and the other is so bad that o get an alert that it's a weak charge. Over night it won't even hit 100%. I tested multiple charging blocks and surge protectors with the same results. I would strongly suggest looking at other options.
customer_reviews.author: Moe

customer_reviews.title: Best USB C Cable I've Tried
customer_reviews.text: I've tried 3 different brands off Amazon. Tried some black plastic/rubber coated ones that are pretty stiff and don't want to stay in my phone. Tried some red braided ones similar to these that have a longer insulator around the connections. Those are better but still stiff at the connectors which can cause the cable to work out of the phone if using while charging. This one is the best of the three, and better than OEM. Very flexible and "snaps" into the phone when fully inserted. Would buy again and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Martha3065

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought a lot of charging cords for my Samsung phone and inevitably they fray or stop charging my phone. This SB Type C Cable, MARGE PLUS USB is still going. I purchased this in January, and to date, it hasn't frayed or stopped charging my phone. I'm really impressed, its the longest-lasting charging cord I've ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Malia

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality USB cables
customer_reviews.text: This is my second order of these cables. The first set I have had for over a year. They work as expected and are of very good quality. I like the thick braided cover on these cables. In the first set of cables I ordered, I had one out of the three cables were bad. The seller was easy to work with to return and replace the cable. All three cables from this order seem to work fine.
customer_reviews.author: Richard C Schoeneck

customer_reviews.title: Long, durable and reliable
customer_reviews.text: I could not believe the price for these. I've paid more for one cord that did not last and was not as long. I greatly appreciate the length because I'll often charge my phone by the bed and if I want to keep it charging and use it I have to unplug it and forget to plug it back in. I can play a game, look at social media and just set it back on my night stand.
customer_reviews.author: Troy A. Beal

customer_reviews.title: Great value fast charging
customer_reviews.text: These are just perfect for my new phone I got for Christmas. I needed additional chargers so I ordered these and they fit very well and charge fast, which is one of the first features I look for in a phone charger. They are built solid and I expect they will last a long time. Quick delivery makes for an all around A experience. Will definitely order again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne King

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: These cables break really easily... the metal plug bends with little o no pressure and then the cable is ultimately useless. We've gone through all 3 of them in less than a month. Would not recommend this product what so ever.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey N.

customer_reviews.title: Lasted a year or a little more
customer_reviews.text: Bought these 16 months ago. The first one broke at 1 year, the last one broke last night. If you expect cables to last a year or a little more these are fine. If you expect more, pick a different cable. P.S. This was with me being careful to hold my phone in such a way as to bend the cable as little as possible. It would likely break sooner if you were not as careful as I was. I'll look for an L shaped connector next time.
customer_reviews.author: Becky Bittle

customer_reviews.title: WARNING!!DO NOT BUY!!
customer_reviews.text: WARNING!!!!Been using for 2 months. Just yesterday it started sizzling at the USB-C end while charging my Note 8, noticed some liquid leaking out. My charging port was very hot. Now my charging port is broken, I can no longer charge my phone via USB. DO NOT BUY!!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Flexible, carry large current, and the most durable by far.
customer_reviews.text: These are the ones you want! The first thing I noticed was that these cords are extremely flexible. These are the only flexible cords I've used that could handle fast charge current. So that's two big pluses there! I used these cords on the fly, wadded up in my pocket, wrapped around the phone, falling on the ground with my phone, LOL. It's been a year now, and they still work like when they were new. I thought I'd wait till they wore out, but that never happened. I did NOT expect that. Impossibly great cords!
customer_reviews.author: Donald Craft

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought March 5th 2018 today is March 28th 2018 and the cord does not charge anymore. Didn't even last a month. Used nightly and stayed in one spot so was not wear and tear.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Type C Cables and Great Deal!
customer_reviews.text: You can never have enough charging cables for your phone. I like to leave one in different rooms in my house so I don't have to keep unplugging the same cable. These 6 ft. Type C Cables are just the right length so that you are not pulling on the charger. They are a nice silver color, braided for durability and have solid connectors. It's a 3 pack which m as kes it even a better deal. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: John J Zucco

customer_reviews.title: These are AWESOME~Using one right now!
customer_reviews.text: These are AWESOME~Using one right now! I love them!! Very sturdy, nice and long! This is all true>>>>> Feature:Premium nylon braided jacket that can bear 10000+ bending tests for extra protection and durability. Benefit from a cable that’s 6.ft (1.8m) long to connect your devices further than ever without compromising your comfort. Enjoying the fast data sync & charge anywhere and anytime.
customer_reviews.author: Sister

customer_reviews.title: Quit working after 1.5 years.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in February of 2019, as of July 2020 only 1 is still working. Got a good year and a few months out of them before they started to only "slow charge" and then just stopped working altogether. I replaced them with a different brand. I guess I got my money's worth, but I wouldn't buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Heavy Cables
customer_reviews.text: These are Type C cables, so be forewarned. They are very heavy and I'm quite sure they will last a long time. They are a bit stiff because of the metal sheafing on the cable, but that is exactly what I was looking for in cables. The price is right You won't be disappointed with these.
customer_reviews.author: Dale in Tennessee

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality, low durability
customer_reviews.text: This product has a six-month life span. I stupidly bought it twice. You're better off spending money on a product that doesn't last more than six months, and I exclusively use it in the car. There has been no wear and tear on the cable
customer_reviews.author: AFS

customer_reviews.title: In light of recent events, will be pickier with quality.
customer_reviews.text: Won't buy ever again. But you can. I like my cords to last. Especially, when only a couple of months and its showing wear as if years went by. I also hate trying to figure out which way to plug it in. There's cheaper superior products out there. The company I used before had none of these issues and came w a leather strap to wrap it with.
customer_reviews.author: Saveyourmoney

customer_reviews.title: Crapped out after only a few weeks of intermittent use.
customer_reviews.text: Although it worked originally, it no longer charges my cell phone. Would appreciate an exchange if at all possible, as this may just be a product-specific glitch.
customer_reviews.author: L. Theisinger

customer_reviews.title: Study and Durable
customer_reviews.text: I love these cord. It's like a shoe lace coated charger. I bought 3 for my mom, my teenage sister, and myself. Good length, fits well with Samsung Galaxy S8+ S9+ and S10+. I also love them because we have 4 cats and 2 like to chew on cords (try to hide them as much as possible but sometimes it just happens) and they tried chewing these cords and it holds up really really. They also fast charge and fit perfect in my phone!
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: After a short while they have one by one stopped working for fast charge on my Galaxy s8Plus
customer_reviews.text: After a short while they have one by one stopped working for fast charge on my Galaxy s8Plus. I don't understand. They still charge but very slow.. I received an inquiry from the vendor advising/inquiring that they would be replacing the cables if I agreed. I haven't heard from them since. one of the cables is still working fine. If I don't hear further, I will be looking to pay for a product that has a reliable warantee
customer_reviews.author: Sobiwon

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Cables. I'm immensly impressed by the quality.
customer_reviews.text: I have used all three and they all work great. I am very impressed by the quality of the cables and also the packaging. Each cable comes wrapped in a rubber that stays on the cable for future use. And all three come in a high quality bag with a draw string to carry and store them . I am not sure what material it is made out of but feels soft yet durable in my hands. The negative reviews have GOT to be from a competitor.
customer_reviews.author: R C

product_meta.title: USB Type C Cable, MARGE PLUS USB C Cable 3 Pack (6Ft) Nylon Braided USB C to USB A Fast Charger Cord Compatible Samsung Galaxy S10 S9 S8 Plus Note10 9 8, LG V50 G8, Moto Z Z3 and More
feature_bullets: 【What you get】: 3*6ft(1.8M) USB C Cable + 1*adapter. If you are not satisfied with our products, you can get full refund or replacement within 18 months.

【2019 New Fast Charging and Sync】: High quality rapid charging power,output up to 5V, 2.4A, data transfer speed up to 480 Mbps. It also contained 56K ohm resistor to protect your Device from high current danger and ensure safe charging.

【Note】: 1. Our usb c cable can only charge Google pixel 2/3/3XL normally but can not support fast charges. If you want to charge quickly, you should use the Pixel original C-port wall charger and C to C cable. 2. Not compatible with iPad Pro, MacBook Air / Pro.

【Perfect 3Pack-6FT 】: With the 6FT length, you can lay any way your want in bed or the back seat of the car and still be on your phone! Using at home, car & office and extra an adapter use in micro USB port and converts it to USB C.
【Usb-C Compatibility 】: Connect USB Type-C enabled devices such as Samsung Galaxy S10 S10E S9 S8 Note 10 9 8, Moto Z/Z2, LG G5/G6/V20/V30 and other USB C compatible phones.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars6,716 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
